mapper.insert: insert into bus_inventory (product_id, count_, in_time, in_price, zone_, zone_id, user_id, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark_, enable_) values (#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zoneId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update bus_inventory set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, count_ = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, in_time = #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, in_price = #{inPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, zone_ = #{zone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zone_id = #{zoneId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable_ = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id_, product_id, count_, in_time, in_price, zone_, zone_id, user_id, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark_, enable_ from bus_inventory where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
